INVALID_AUTHORIZATION_HEADER: Token not provided in headers or cookies.
INVALID_AUTHORIZATION_TOKEN: Authorization headers are not in Bearer format.
UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.
PRIVILEGE_CHECK_FAILED: User doesn't have the required permissions for ${privilege}.
JWT_INVALID_SIGNATURE: Token probably modified or signature changed: invalid signature
JWT_INVALID_TOKEN: Token probably modified or signature changed: invalid token
JWT_UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown Error Occurred while decoding token
